args.content:
import Mathlib

open Set

variable {F : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup F] [NormedSpace â„ F] [InnerProductSpace â„ F] [CompleteSpace F]

theorem norm_gradient_eq_sup (f : F â†’ â„) (x : F) (h : HasFDerivAt f (fderiv â„ f x) x) :
  â€–gradient f xâ€– = Sup { â€–(fderiv â„ f x) vâ€– | v âˆˆ ({v : F | â€–vâ€– = 1} : Set F) } := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

variable {F : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup F] [NormedSpace â„ F] [InnerProductSpace â„ F] [CompleteSpace F]

/-- The norm of the gradient equals the operator norm of the derivative. -/
theorem norm_gradient_eq_opNorm (f : F â†’ â„) (x : F) (h : HasFDerivAt f (fderiv â„ f x) x) :
  â€–gradient f xâ€– = (fderiv â„ f x).opNorm := by
  sorry
